ComicInfo.Summary:
Devil Dance: John Blaze and Ghost Rider are transported to somewhere else where Mephisto tells them he needs to test their powers and if they pass they will be allowed to ally with him in the upcoming fight against the forces breaking down the dimensional walls. He sends two Soulless Ones to fight them. John and Ghost Rider are able to defeat them and Mephisto says they passed the first test. He crushes the Soulless Ones and says he can't kill John and the Ghost Rider so he must steal their souls.
The Great Hunt Part II: Ghost Rider allows himself to be captured so that he can rescue the people taken by The Feeders. They brag that they have been a part of the earth since the beginning and that nothing can destroy them, but Ghost Rider defeats their most powerful member with his penance stare.
